long_description: The Seirus Floppy Quick Shade hat shields your eyes and face from the sun, but includes the added benefit of a built-in sun cape to shield your neck as well, keeping you cool and covered. Versatile sun cape is a lightweight tube of fabric that can be worn as a cape, neck gaiter or even a headband. Breathable nylon fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly; wide brim folds up and secures on the sides with snaps. Internal headband keeps sweat out of your eyes. Attached suncape covers your neck; cape and hat fabric include UPF 25 sun protection.
